column5: Not sure if this has already been posted or not... but I came across this and thought it was pretty cool!  TrollPro.com - Underwater Trolling Housing for GoPro
Very cool , thats got me think'n what can i do with my Fish TV .... lol .
My buddy just said "hell, I can make one of those with a PVC pipe". I'm looking forward to seeing what he comes up with! lol
I am thinking , take the prop off an old  trolling motor and mount the cam in its place  ... lol .

Tell your buddy that while he's down there at the cannonball anyway, drop in a depth probe, temp at the ball, PH level and a sender back to the LCD screen on the rigger and he'll have a winner. It wouldn't take a genius to do it...just somebody way more gifted than me.
THATS AWESOME !!! thanks for sharing jamie...
That's a good idea.  Then you can control the angle of the camera too.  I guess the benifit of the GO-Pro one, is that you can send it way back away from the boat, near your lure.
Here is the link to a Homemade one:  http://www.thehulltr...-housing.html#b  Regards, Snowball
Just what Terry needs,another toy.  Very cool.
Ya saw that. Better beaf-up to 4lb flouro for that bad-boy.
yeah saw that some time ago and someone had a link to a homemade one
Someone posted it in a thread I asked about trolling Gopro it looks awesome it also looks easy to make but wonder if it's worth it? Let us know how your buddy makes out
